summary: A history of this one-of-a-kind show told through interviews with cast, crew, and the fans.
cast: John Amodeo|Will Arnett|Scott Baio|Jason Bateman|Ed Begley Jr.|Jay Chandrasekhar|David Cross|Portia de Rossi|Paul Feig|Scott Fergusson|Dianne Ketchum Friedgen|Paul Goebel|Brian Grazer|Tony Hale|Greg Harrington|James Hawkinson|Jon Hein|Ron Howard|Mitchell Hurwitz|Justin Lee|Olympia LePoint|Lisa Matsukawa|David Nevins|Keith Olbermann|Maria Pendolino|David Reynolds|Andy Richter|Ian Roberts|Anthony Russo|Joe Russo|Kent Victor Schuelke|Alia Shawkat|Katie Sparks|Matthew A. Steinhart|Jeffrey Tambor|James Vallely|Justin Grant Wade|Matt Walsh|Mae Whitman|Henry Winkler|Cedric Yarbrough
title: The Arrested Development Documentary Project
